desc: A healing substance which restores the body.
A relaxing substance which restores the mind.
A rejuvenating substance which restores the core.
Oddly sweet, this herb is often consumed in the wild for a quick burst of energy.
Even as it dives, the gyrfalcon never makes a sound.
These precious gems appear translucent under a moonlit sky, yet shimmer only faintly otherwise.
An empowering aura appears to surround it.
Originating from the kingdom of Valesia, these nuts are hard to crack!
A dragon’s scales are said to hold the courage of the warrior who vanquished them.
For some reason, staring at this toad is oddly calming.
Touching this stone to one’s head opens the mind, allowing for a greater understanding of the universe.
It appears to be whispering old incantations, none of which that can be discerned.
